akn:subsection.akn:heading: Enlisted Members Required To Make Up Time Lost.—

akn:content.akn:p: (a) An enlisted member of an armed force who— is liable, after his return to full duty, to serve for a period that, when added to the period that he served before his absence from duty, amounts to the term for which he was enlisted or inducted.

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Officers Not Allowed Service Credit for Time Lost.—

akn:content.akn:p: (b) In the case of an officer of an armed force who after February 10, 1996— the period of such desertion, absence, confinement, or inability to perform duties may not be counted in computing, for any purpose other than basic pay under section 205 of title 37, the officer’s length of service.
